Minkah Fitzpatrick

Minkah Fitzpatrick

Position: FS

6-1, 207lb (185cm, 93kg)

Team: Miami Dolphins

Born: November 17, 1996 in Old Bridge, NJ

College: Alabama  (College Stats)

Weighted Career AV (100-95-...): 61 (1056th overall since 1960)

High School: St. Peter's Prep (NJ)

Draft: Miami Dolphins in the 1st round (11th overall) of the 2018 NFL Draft.

Pronunciation: \MINK-uh\

Instagram: fittypat21

  • 5x Pro Bowl
  • 3x All-Pro
+1

2/21 The Dolphins turned down offers for running back De’Von Achane and wide receiver Jaylen Waddle at the trade deadline, and their stance on the matter has not changed heading into the offseason. Miami

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Minkah Fitzpatrick?

Minkah Fitzpatrick is 29 years old.

When was Minkah Fitzpatrick born?

Minkah Fitzpatrick was born on November 17, 1996.

Where was Minkah Fitzpatrick born?

Minkah Fitzpatrick was born in Old Bridge, NJ.

How tall is Minkah Fitzpatrick?

Minkah Fitzpatrick is 6-1 (185 cm) tall.

How much does Minkah Fitzpatrick weigh?

Minkah Fitzpatrick weighs 207 lbs (93 kg).

How many games does Minkah Fitzpatrick play?

Minkah Fitzpatrick played 14 games last season and 120 games over his career.

How many interception return yards does Minkah Fitzpatrick have?

Minkah Fitzpatrick had 7 interception return yards last season and 415 interception return yards over his career.

How many Super Bowls has Minkah Fitzpatrick won?

Minkah Fitzpatrick has never won a Super Bowl.

What is Minkah Fitzpatrick's Instagram account?

Minkah Fitzpatrick is on Instagram at fittypat21.
